item.description: don't ask me why I waited until now to update, idk but RECORDING IN PROGRESS ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤© aaaand also I'm considering adding onto this website ðŸ‘€ it's a fun little site but I want to make it MORE fun, yknow? idk how I'm gonna do it, but I'll certainly give it a try!
songwriting inspo feels really weird sometimes ðŸ¥² planning out a three song EP, writing a few songs over a week, and now having to sort out a NINE SONG ALBUM??? wild

HEYYYYYYY DIY MICROBLOG??? This whole thing is HEAVILY based on Threads, but I wanted to make something to see if I could! turns out, it's not as hard as I thought it'd be ðŸ‘€ this doesn't even REALLY have to be a microblog, since there's no character limit! I think this is will be a fun little place for updates and announcements!
